content: *meet the gloria tote bag your new favorite crochet project * the gloria tote bag is pure crochet joy fun to make and even more fun to carry everywhere plush yarn and a beautiful irresistible stitch pattern come together to create a bag that s both stylish and satisfying fair warning once you finish one your friends or even the whole group chat might start dropping hints for their very own * view this pattern for free on my blog 1 * **materials** * 480 yards worsted weight yarn in 3 colors sample uses lion brand re-make in chestnut hazelnut and azure blue * 5mm crochet hook * scissors * locking stitch markers * tape measure * tapestry needle * steam blocking supplies garment steamer blocking mats rust-proof t-pins **techniques** * basic crochet stitches * interlocking block stitch * working in turned rounds * creating a bag handle * steam blocking technique **measurements** bag measures 11 wide 3 deep and 15 high // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 https //tlycblog com/gloria-tote-bag-a-free-beginner-crochet-multicolored-handbag-pattern/
